alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Greeley; Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 11 at 12:04AM CDT until April 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather continue into Wednesday; Red Flag Warning Tuesday and Fire Weather Watch Wednesday... .Multiple days of warm to hot temperatures and a dry air mass is forecast to be in place, with breezy to gusty winds in place. This along with the prolonged period of antecedent warm and dry conditions will further exacerbate the fire weather concerns. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MDT /11 AM CDT/ TO 8 PM MDT /9 PM CDT/ TUESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 013, 014, 027, 028, 041, 042, 079, 252, 253, AND 254... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 013, 014, 027, 028, 041, 042, 079, 252, 253, AND 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma, Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson and Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne, Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman, Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas, Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace, Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan, Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy. * Winds...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Temperatures...In the mid 80s. * Impacts...Extreme and unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor burning. Repeating, outdoor burning is not advised on Tuesday. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne; Greeley; Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita
